page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content: GIRVAN has many Clubs,some with their own premises.The Bowling Club is open all year with in-door bowls taking over in winter.The Club House is used for general entertainments and dances at the week-end and meals are served in summer.Similar conditions apply at the Golf Club and both are open to the public.Tennis and Sailing Clubs operate in summer and have dances in winter.Other winter sport is provided by a Curling Club whose members travel to Ayr and Stranraer for ice. There are many other clubs associated with the churches catering for all age groups and too numerous to mention. Flourishing Rotary and Round table give much help to old and young alike.
